data.text: @blackwidow_94 @CityNewsKIT Thanks sheep. Back in your crate.
@CityNewsKIT I imagine a business that would maintain this requirement won't last long.

@EdnCan @CityNewsKIT No we didn’t. We didn’t invest in testing - that’s practically nonexistent now. We didn’t invest in better air ventilation systems in our indoor public spaces - most are just circulating the virus. 

So now, it’s like an all you can eat buffet for the virus. Good times.
@nicoledelville @CityNewsKIT Then staying home is your best option if you are afraid…but that’s. Choice you have to make now
@blackwidow_94 @CityNewsKIT You lost me at stand with Trudeau

@nicoledelville @CityNewsKIT Nor is your tweet so stfu if you wanna stay in your own lockdown good  Society will appreciate not seeing negative people like you, that are uneducated on the topic. have no hopes of seeing daylight. But no let's just blame the unvaxxed you mad because you lost and gave in.
@blackwidow_94 @CityNewsKIT Nobody is stopping you from keeping up your own lock down routine whilst we all get back to life you'll be sitting there pouting
@CityNewsKIT Ban it as a future option
@CityNewsKIT No more masks..the children are prisoners
